Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2011 08:56AM vinicaka wrote: Is there a network or list of surgeon or oncologist for Vancouver area?  My family doctor "insist" to refer me to a specialist (general surgeon) who I felt not "comfortable" to deal with after two visits to her office!! Can anyone tell me that what is the proper procedure for one like me?   I've diagnosed with DCIU (stage 0 grade II) after my biopsy done last week.   My family doctor refer me to a specialist (general surgeon).  On the 1st visit to this specialist office, she asked me what do I prefer to do for surgery.  Without details of my diagnosed report, without explanation of what I have, how can she ask me this question???  I kept asking her question and keep looking for information and browse around all the web,  then I start to know what my situation is.
Posts.Title: MRI for follow-up in the future gutsy vinicaka
